required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Absorption, Metabolism and Excretion of [14C]-Lasmiditan - Single Oral Dose Administration
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Study to Investigate the Absorption, Metabolism, and Excretion of [14C]-Lasmiditan Following Single Oral Dose Administration in Healthy Male and Female Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This study will be an open-label, nonrandomized, absorption, metabolism, and excretion study of [14C]-lasmiditan administered as a 200-mg (approximately 100 µCi) oral solution to 8 healthy male and female subjects, following at least a 10 hour fast from food to assess the pharmacokinetics (PK), metabolism, and routes and extent of elimination of a single oral dose of 200 mg (approximately 100 µCi) [14C] lasmiditan in healthy male and female subjects.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Sequential timepoints - Predose and 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48, 72, 96, 120, 144, 168, and 192 hours postdose
primary_outcome.description: maximum observed concentration based on plasma concentrations of lasmiditan

primary_outcome.time_frame: Sequential timepoints - Predose and 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48, 72, 96, 120, 144, 168, and 192 hours postdose
primary_outcome.description: time to maximum concentration based on plasma concentrations of lasmiditan

primary_outcome.time_frame: Sequential timepoints - Predose and 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48, 72, 96, 120, 144, 168, and 192 hours postdose
primary_outcome.description: Area under concentration time curve (AUC) from Hour 0 to the last measurable concentration based on plasma concentrations of lasmiditan

primary_outcome.time_frame: Sequential timepoints - Predose and 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48, 72, 96, 120, 144, 168, and 192 hours postdose
primary_outcome.description: AUC0-∞ of total radioactivity in blood/AUC0-∞ of total radioactivity in plasma

primary_outcome.time_frame: Sequential timepoints - Predose and 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48, 72, 96, 120, 144, 168, and 192 hours postdose
primary_outcome.description: AUC0-∞ of lasmiditan in plasma/AUC0-∞ of total radioactivity in plasma

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Urine samples collected -12 to 0 hours (predose) and intervals: 0 to 6, 6 to 12, 12 to 24, 24 to 48, 48 to 72, 72 to 96, 96 to 120, 120 to 144, 144 to 168, and 168 to 192 hours post dose
secondary_outcome.description: amount excreted in urine (Aeu) over sampling interval

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of lasmiditan recover in urine (%UR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Urine samples collected -12 to 0 hours (predose) and intervals: 0 to 6, 6 to 12, 12 to 24, 24 to 48, 48 to 72, 72 to 96, 96 to 120, 120 to 144, 144 to 168, and 168 to 192 hours post dose
Urine samples collected -12 to 0 hours (predose) and intervals: 0 to 6, 6 to 12, 12 to 24, 24 to 48, 48 to 72, 72 to 96, 96 to 120, 120 to 144, 144 to 168, and 168 to 192 hours post dose
secondary_outcome.description: CLR = Aeu/AUC0-x (where x is the last interval collected; for lasmiditan only)

other_outcome.measure: Safety assessments measured by physical exams, vital signs, ECGs and clinical labs along with adverse events (AEs).
other_outcome.time_frame: 49 days:from time of consent through follow-up phone call.
other_outcome.description: Safety will be assessed from time of consent through end of study phone call (up to 49 days).

arm_group.description: [14C]-lasmiditan administered as a 200 mg (approximately 100 µCi) oral solution

intervention.description: [14C]-lasmiditan as a 200 mg (approximately 100 µCi) oral solution
